Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel

Interface ObservableByClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game, GameExpert
public interface ObservableByClient
Interface that is used by any object that can be observed by the client to draw and play the game. It defines many getter methods needed to observe the game state.

    • getNumOfPlayers

      int getNumOfPlayers()
      Getter for the number of players selected for this game
      Returns:
      the number of players

    • getGameMode

      GameMode getGameMode()
      Getter for the game mode selected for this game
      Returns:
      the game mode selected for this game

    • getCurrentPlayer

      String getCurrentPlayer()
      Getter for the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      the player currently executing their planning/action turn, null if firstRoundOrder hasn't been determined yet

    • getPlayers

      List<String> getPlayers()
      Getter for the nickname of connected players
      Returns:
      a list with the nickname of connected players

    • getPlayerTeams

      HashMap<String,TowerColor> getPlayerTeams()
      Getter for the teams
      Returns:
      a hashmap with a nickname as key and the tower color as value

    • getPlayerWizard

      HashMap<String,WizardType> getPlayerWizard()
      Getter for the wizards chosen
      Returns:
      a hashmap with a nickname as key and the wizard as value

    • getPlayerOrder

      List<String> getPlayerOrder()
      Returns current player order
      Returns:
      a list of nicknames ordered

    • getActualMovePower

      int getActualMovePower(String nickname)
      Returns the max amount of island groups a given player can move
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player who can move the returned number of steps
      Returns:
      the max amount of island groups a given player can move

    • getCardsPlayedThisRound

      LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> getCardsPlayedThisRound()
      Method used to observe cards played this round. Returned according to current order (planning or action). To return them ordered, it uses the currentOrder given by TurnManager. If no order has been established yet, it will return an empty LinkedHashMap.
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashMap containing the nickname of the Player and the ID of the card played.

    • getCardsPlayedLastRound

      LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> getCardsPlayedLastRound()
      Method used to observe cards played last round. Returned according to current order (planning or action). To return them ordered, it uses the currentOrder given by TurnManager. If no order has been established yet, it will return an empty LinkedHashMap.
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashMap containing the nickname of the Player and the ID of the card played

    • getCurrentPhase

      Phase getCurrentPhase()
      Method to observe the current phase of the game. Needed to let know the controller which order to calculate.
      Returns:
      the current phase.

    • getAvailableTowerColors

      List<TowerColor> getAvailableTowerColors()
      Returns the tower colors selectable
      Returns:
      the tower colors selectable

    • getAvailableWizards

      List<WizardType> getAvailableWizards()
      Returns the wizards selectable
      Returns:
      the wizards selectable

    • getTowersLeft

      HashMap<TowerColor,Integer> getTowersLeft()
      Returns how many towers are left to be placed for each team
      Returns:
      a hashmap with tower color as key and the number of towers left as key

    • getWinner

      TowerColor getWinner()
      Returns the team that has won the game.
      Returns:
      the towerColor of the team who has won the game

    • getCardsLeft

      List<Integer> getCardsLeft(String nickname)
      Returns a list of cards that weren't yet played (thus to be shown to the player)
      Returns:
      a list of cards IDs

      int getEntranceID(String nickname)

      Parameters:
      nickname - the player to query
      Returns:
      the ID of the entrance of a player, or -1 if the nickname doesn't exist

    • getEntranceStudentsIDs

      HashMap<Integer,Color> getEntranceStudentsIDs(String nickname)
      Method to observe all the students in the entrance and their color
      Returns:
      HashMap with the student ID as key and its color as object

    • getTableIDs

      HashMap<Color,Integer> getTableIDs(String nickname)
      Method to get all the table IDs and their color
      Returns:
      an HashMap with the table color as key and the Table ID as object

    • getTableStudentsIDs

      List<Integer> getTableStudentsIDs(String nickname, Color color)
      Method to observe all the students in a table
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the table
      Returns:
      List with the student IDs in the requested table

    • getTowersLeft

      int getTowersLeft(String nickname)
      Returns the amount of towers contained in the TowerSpace of a given player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to check
      Returns:
      the amount of towers contained in the TowerSpace

    • getTableCoinsLeft

      int getTableCoinsLeft(String nickname, Color color)
      Returns the number of coins left to be taken from the table of a given color
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whose table are checked
      color - the color of the table to check
      Returns:
      the number of coins left to be taken

    • getPlayersWizardType

      HashMap<String,WizardType> getPlayersWizardType()
      Method used to observe which player chose which wizard
      Returns:
      An HashMap containing the nickname of the Player and the Wizard chosen

    • getProfessorsOwner

      HashMap<Color,String> getProfessorsOwner()
      Method to observe which Professor is owned by who
      Returns:
      An HashMap with the color of the professor as Key and its owner as Object (null if no player owns it)

    • getCloudIDs

      List<Integer> getCloudIDs()
      Returns a list containing all the IDs of CloudTiles
      Returns:
      a list containing all the IDs of CloudTiles

    • getCloudStudentsIDs

      HashMap<Integer,Color> getCloudStudentsIDs(int cloudTileID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Return all the IDs of students contained in a given cloud along with their color
      Parameters:
      cloudTileID - the ID of the CloudTile
      Returns:
      an HashMap with the Student IDs as Key and their color as Object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown when the CloudTileID doesn't match any existing cloud

    • getBagStudentsLeft

      int getBagStudentsLeft()
      Method to observe how many students are left in the abg
      Returns:
      the number of students left in the bag

    • getArchipelagoStudentIDs

      HashMap<Integer,Color> getArchipelagoStudentIDs()
      Returns all students contained in all islands with their color
      Returns:
      An HashMap with StudentID as key and Color as value

    • getIslandTilesStudentsIDs

      HashMap<Integer,List<Integer>> getIslandTilesStudentsIDs()
      Searches all IslandTiles to find which students each contains
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing as Key the ID of the IslandTile, as object a list of StudentIDs

    • getIslandTilesIDs

      HashMap<Integer,List<Integer>> getIslandTilesIDs()
      For each IslandGroup finds the IDs of its IslandTiles
      Returns:
      An HashMap with key the (current) index of the IslandGroup and a list of its IslandTiles IDs

      int getMotherNatureIslandGroupIdx()

    • getMotherNatureIslandTileID

      the IslandTile ID of the IslandTile which contains MotherNature

    • getIslandGroupsOwners

      HashMap<Integer,TowerColor> getIslandGroupsOwners()
      Returns the IslandGroups indexes along with the TowerColor of the Team who has towers. The color is null when no Team holds the IslandGroup
      Returns:
      an HashMap containing the indexes of the IslandGroup as key and the TowerColor as Key

    • getNoEntryTilesArchipelago

      HashMap<Integer,Integer> getNoEntryTilesArchipelago()
      Returns the IslandGroups indexes along with the number of NoEntryTiles each contains
      Returns:
      The IslandGroups indexes along with the number of NoEntryTiles each contains

      Returns:

    • getActiveCharacterID

      Getter for the ActiveCharacter ID.
      Returns:
      the ActiveCharacter ID. -1 if no character is active.

      Returns:

      Returns the number of times the ability of the active character can still be used.
      Returns:
      the number of times the ability of the active character can still be used.

    • getCharacterStudents

      HashMap<Integer,Color> getCharacterStudents(int ID)
      Getter for the students contained on a given character.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the character requested
      Returns:
      a hash map containing the ID of the students as key and their color as value. If no students are contained, the map will be empty

    • getCharacterCost

      int getCharacterCost(int ID)
      Getter for the current cost of the character.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the character requested
      Returns:
      the cost

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the given character is overcharged.
